titles.title: To provide a Federal charter to the Fab Foundation for the National Fab Lab Network, a national network of local digital fabrication facilities providing universal access to advanced manufacturing tools for learning skills, developing inventions, creating businesses, and producing personalized products, and for other purposes.
National Fab Lab Network Act of 2018
National Fab Lab Network Act of 2018
National Fab Lab Network Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
